mapper.insert: insert into member (id, name, email, password, phone_number, created_at, point, member_level, image_name, image_path, image_size, info) values (MEMBER_PK_SEQ.nextval, #{memberName}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{regDate}, #{point}, #{memberLevel}, #{memberImgName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberImgPath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberImgSize, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id as memberCode, name as memberName, email, password, phone_number as phone, created_at as regDate, point, member_level as memberLevel, image_name as memberImgName, image_path as memberImgPath, image_size as memberImgSize, info as memberInfo from member where email = #{email} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into member(id, email, image_path, name, member_level, created_at, point) values (MEMBER_PK_SEQ.nextval, #{email}, #{memberImgPath}, #{memberName}, 'A', sysdate, 0)
